ComicInfo.Title: The Mask; No Fear; I Honestly Hate You; Hippie
ComicInfo.Summary: The Mask seeks to see his new movie, bumping into various famous faces and colorful characters along the way.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:29:51. [Issue ID 247120]
ComicInfo.Characters: Zoo-Lou (cameo),Trencher (cameo),Yarn Man (cameo),Bob the Alien (cameo),Randy Stradley (wanted poster),The Flying Nun (cameo),Eyeball Kid (cameo),Gregory (cameo)
ComicInfo.Writer: Mike Baron,Eric Luke,Adam Warren,Mike Baron,Eric Luke,Adam Warren
ComicInfo.Penciller: Rich Hedden,Andrew Robinson,Adam Warren,Rick Geary,Rich Hedden,Andrew Robinson,Adam Warren,Rick Geary
ComicInfo.Inker: Keith Aiken,Jim Royal,Adam Warren,Rick Geary,Keith Aiken,Jim Royal,Adam Warren,Rick Geary
